scrollTop.description: Sets the top scroll offset, which only takes effect when overflow-y: scroll is set as a scroll element
scrollTop.description_zh: 设置顶部滚动偏移量，仅在设置了 overflow-y: scroll 成为滚动元素后生效

fixedTop.description: Setting a fixed distance from the top of the container is equivalent to setting position: fixed and top values in CSS, which takes precedence over fixed-bottom, and CSS sets position, top, and bottom values
fixedTop.description_zh: 设置与容器顶部的固定距离，效果相当于在 CSS 中设置 position: fixed 和 top 值，该属性优先级高于 fixed-bottom，CSS 设置的 position、top、bottom 值

fixedRight.description: Setting a fixed distance from the right side of the container is equivalent to setting position: fixed and right values in CSS, which takes precedence over the position, left, and right values set by CSS
fixedRight.description_zh: 设置与容器右侧的固定距离，效果相当于在 CSS 中设置 position: fixed 和 right 值，该属性优先级高于 CSS 设置的 position、left、right 值

fixedBottom.description: Setting a fixed distance from the bottom of the container is equivalent to setting position: fixed and bottom values in CSS, which takes precedence over the position, top, and bottom values set by CSS
fixedBottom.description_zh: 设置与容器底部的固定距离，效果相当于在 CSS 中设置 position: fixed 和 bottom 值，该属性优先级高于 CSS 设置的 position、top、bottom 值

fixedLeft.description: Setting a fixed distance from the left side of the container is equivalent to setting position: fixed and left values in CSS, which takes precedence over fixed-right, and CSS sets position, left, and right values
fixedLeft.description_zh: 设置与容器左侧的固定距离，效果相当于在 CSS 中设置 position: fixed 和 left 值，该属性优先级高于 fixed-right，CSS 设置的 position、left、right 值

ariaRole.description: Accessibility, the role of (role) identity elements
ariaRole.description_zh: 无障碍访问，（角色）标识元素的作用

ariaLabel.description_zh: 无障碍访问，（属性）元素的额外描述

upperThreshold.description: How far from the top/left (in px), the scrolltoupper event is triggered.
upperThreshold.description_zh: 距顶部/左边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltoupper 事件。

lowerThreshold.description: How far from the bottom/right (in px) the scrolltolower event is triggered.
lowerThreshold.description_zh: 距底部/右边多远时（单位px），触发 scrolltolower 事件。

scrollIntoView.description: Scroll to a child element, and the value should be the id of a child element. When scrolling to the element, the top of the element snaps to the top of the scroll area. Note: scroll-into-view takes precedence over scroll-top.
scrollIntoView.description_zh: 滚动到子元素，值应为某子元素的 id。当滚动到该元素时，元素顶部对齐滚动区域顶部。说明：scroll-into-view 的优先级高于 scroll-top。

scrollWithAnimation.description: Use animated transitions when setting the scrollbar position.
scrollWithAnimation.description_zh: 在设置滚动条位置时使用动画过渡。

scrollAnimationDuration.description: When scroll-with-animation is set to true, you can set scroll-animation-duration to control the execution time of the animation, in ms.
scrollAnimationDuration.description_zh: 当 scroll-with-animation设置为 true 时，可以设置 scroll-animation-duration 来控制动画的执行时间，单位 ms。

enableBackToTop.description: When you click the top status bar of iOS or double-click the title bar of Android, the scroll bar returns to the top and only supports portrait orientation.
enableBackToTop.description_zh: 当点击 iOS 顶部状态栏或者双击 Android 标题栏时，滚动条返回顶部，只支持竖向。

trapScroll.description: When scrolling vertically, when scrolling to the top or bottom, the page scrolling is forcibly disabled, and only the scroll-view itself is still triggered.
trapScroll.description_zh: 纵向滚动时，当滚动到顶部或底部时，强制禁止触发页面滚动，仍然只触发 scroll-view 自身的滚动。

disableLowerScroll.description: Before scrolling occurs, determine the scrolling direction, if the direction is top/left, if the value is 'always', it will always disable scrolling, if the value is 'out-of-bounds, and it is currently scrolled to the top/left, scrolling will be disabled.
disableLowerScroll.description_zh: 发生滚动前，对滚动方向进行判断，当方向是顶部/左边时，如果值为`always`将始终禁止滚动，如果值为`out-of-bounds 且当前已经滚动到顶部/左边，禁止滚动。

disableUpperScroll.description: When the direction is bottom/right, if the value is 'always', it will always prohibit scrolling, and if the value is 'out-of-bounds, it will be disabled if it is currently scrolling to the bottom/right.
disableUpperScroll.description_zh: 发生滚动前，对滚动方向进行判断，当方向是底部/右边时，如果值为`always`将始终禁止滚动，如果值为`out-of-bounds 且当前已经滚动到底部/右边，禁止滚动。

onScrollToUpper.description: Scrolling to the top/left triggers the scrolltoupper event.
onScrollToUpper.description_zh: 滚动到顶部/左边，会触发 scrolltoupper 事件。

onScrollToLower.description: Scrolling to the bottom/right triggers the scrolltolower event.
onScrollToLower.description_zh: 滚动到底部/右边，会触发 scrolltolower事件。

onScroll.description: 滚动时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth}。
onScroll.description_zh: 滚动时触发，event.detail = {scrollLeft, scrollTop, scrollHeight, scrollWidth}。

onTouchCancel.description: Touch actions are interrupted, such as call reminders, pop-ups.
onTouchCancel.description_zh: 触摸动作被打断，如来电提醒、弹窗。
